content.detailedDescription: At aprox. 2:28 am morning of jan 14 2014 in virginia beach va i was looking over the north east waiting to see if i could spot the three rockets being launched from wallops island flight facility, out of the corner of my eye i had spotted a light that looked like a star, but i had not seen any other stars all night due to cloud cover. the only lights in the sky were the moon and jupiter right directly above me. i continued to stare at the light as it appeared to move upward slowly, i thought it was the first of the three rockets but it was strange that there was no trail of purple like i have seen before. i attempted to get a video with my phone but it was too dark. the star moved upward for about 15 seconds and then seemed to move left quite fast then looked as if it went down and the just vanished. i would love to hear if anyone saw this or has any info on what it might be.
content.summary: Light went up slow turned left fast and vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and walked out back to smoke at around 0930am. i saw a white object in the sky. i thought it was stationary at first becasue i didn't see it moving. it was a few miles away and was fairly high. it began to move across the sky and i assumed it was a plane. i was watching it still not really concentrating.I noticed it stopped moving and was stationary again. i thought perhaps it had been turning and just appeared to be stationary to my view. it suddenly went straight up really fast for a second and stopped again. the speed it went up with was not something i had seen before. now i was paying attention. i know what i saw. no one would believe me. i grabbed my cell phone and snapped a quick picture of it. i also looked at the time. it was 9:35 am. it isnt' a great photo but i did get it while it was still. i'm not saying i took a picture of a "ufo" but the movement this object made was not something i had ever seen a plane make. i continued to watch the object not really sure if i was seeing this clearly or had i just not been paying attention. while i was paying attention, it very quickly moved to the left so fast that i had to turn move my eyes to find it. it stopped again stationary. it stayed there for a about 6 seconds and then i lost it. i don't know if it moved again really fast or just disappeared. i'm not saying this was "ufo" but it moved faster than an object, normal object, can move at that distance from me. it also stopeed twice and just sat there. since the hairs on my body stood up i decided to tell someone. i didn't want to tell my coworkers or family what i had seen. i don't even know what i saw. if it was a plane, it is not like any plane i have ever seen or heard of. i was hoping maybe if this was looked at, you folks might be able to rationalize it for me.
content.summary: Unreal movement

content.detailedDescription:
"ready" is a term that has shown up in many stories about close encounters of the third kind. i am very much on my guard for when this word shows up because i have had an encounter in which the word was spoken to me by a reptilian:

in august, 1959, my parents and i were traveling to colorado springs on a vacation. (this was before my 11th birthday on august 19.) for some unknown reason, dad decided that we would stop and visit mt. capulin, an extinct volcano in the northeast corner of new mexico. mom stayed in the tourist center while dad and i climbed up the side of the volcano and down into the crater. then we returned to the center. i had a desperate need to go to the bathroom.

as i was walking through the center, i felt myself stop in mid-step. i felt my mind lift out of my body, and drop straight through the floor. how deep, i cannot imagine. my "drop" ended in an arched tunnel deep underground; the tunnel was lighted with orange lights.

standing in front of me was a smallish being/entity that i now know to identify as a reptilian. i would estimate its height at somewhere around 4 feet tall. it was wearing a grey-color robe with long sleeves, and a hood. the most i could see of its face was "intense, oversized dark eyes". in its left hand (number of fingers unclear,but definitely a thumb) it held something that we today would describe as an ipad or the like. in its right hand it held some kind of stylus.

it looked straight at me, and with mind-to-mind talk, said (testily), "what are you doing here? we're not ready for you yet!"

then my mind zoomed back up through the ground and back into my head, where i stood in the tourist center. immediately, i double-timed it to the ladies' room, and "got relief" just in time.

since then i have lived, wondering when the "we" that this alien/entity represented, would be ready for me. i have had other encounters with ufo-related entities, like the mib dressed in a black warrant officer's uniform, driving a yellow mini-cooper, on the military base near keflavik, iceland. he told me, "go home" and pointed towards the southwest and north america.

maybe the aliens/entities have visited me, and i don't remember it. thanks for letting me post my story.
content.summary: Reptilian tunnels under mt. capulin, new mexico

content.detailedDescription: My son in law was driving, i was sitting in the back seat. my daughter who was up front noticed first. she said out loud, hey you guys, do you see that? at this point we were coming up on the sherman way exit heading south on the 170 hollywood freeway. the 2 fireballs were moving horizontally one above each other at 50' apart traveling in unison at a pretty fast rate of speed going the opposite direction that we were traveling at roughly 500' overhead as it passed us. there were only a few cars maybe 2 or three on the freeway with us at a considerable distance between us. as the 2 fire balls past us, i had a great view with no obstructions since i was in the back seat. as the 2 fireballs past us the fireball that was fly the lowest, left its flight pattern, it dropped between 25' to 50' from its original flight pattern and accelerated up ahead of the upper fire ball. at this point the 2 fireballs seem to have came together one above the other over the 170 hollywood freeway and 5 freeyway junction/merge where the traffic there was good, it hovered there for a bit, we finally lost visual sight. it was hovering over the merge/junction. description of the 2 fireballs: about 15' to 20' circular fireballs! the fireballs flames were compact, did not leave long flame trails whatsoever!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 fireballs over the 170 hollywood free way, 500' over head, january 11, 2014 7:37pm

content.detailedDescription:
All descriptive info is as in my previous filed report , ie; this report now is just a continuation of same sightings of this large 'object' .
p.S. first photo is always the original shot & the next ones following it are the cropped images plus some additional analysis of the object . (2 images of same uap in this report , pic# 101-1383.Jpg 12-12-2013 , pic# 101-1373.Jpg 11-12-2013 ). actually i'm having some difficulty this time around accessing these pics for an upload on the computer's new app system upgrade , in the following day or two will directly forward the rest of evidence directly to the hq as suggested before by andre morin ( of canadian mufon branch). thanks. 
peace .
content.summary: Uap sightings , 2 phots included , continuation to previous cms repot # 52819

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were walking along the edmonds ferry terminal when my girlfriend looked se and said "what is that?"  i looked where she pointed and saw two triangles in the sky rotating toward us in formation.  i asked her to start using her smartphone to record the event which lasted about 5 minutes.  the lights just vanished over us.
content.summary: Six lights that hovered as two triangles in formation.

content.detailedDescription: Zoom in just to the middle right, object is above lanai
content.summary: Look middle to right....Zoom in

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving south on 8th ave.At almaden, eugene or. when 1st. object was observed. it took only moments to realize it was no known terrestrial craft.We continued west to 11th ave to get a clearer view an then noticed 2 more objects with same apparent shape and color. while the first had turned west and faded 2 more appeared from south. while observing these a 4th appeared and shortly after a 5th. they all followed the same approximate path, coming from south then slowly turning to west. they appeared roundish and were all the same approximate color. they were moving slowly, about the speed of a private plane or slower, seemed to follow a smooth path with no apparent color or other changes. as i have seen many other unknowns(and photographed many) it was a treat to observe these and wasn't frightened, nor was there any apparent  subconscious communication. i tried to video and then tried to photo objects with poor results. as it turned out the battery was nearly exhausted probably affecting photo quality. all 5 after heading west faded from sight.
took several photos, but most were squiggly. i apologize for the quality of these.
content.summary: Friend saw 1st, unusual orangy light moving from south toward us.

content.detailedDescription: In my 6th floor apt-curtains open to patio-i am an oil painting artist-i enjoy looking at sky -day or night-many times before other tenants in our 12 story building have mentioned seeing odd lites in nite sky-like me-so i report sightings -i have before ;tenants reported to local police also.So tonite jan.13th 2014 i see very east -closer to lake michigan than other sightings which were east/westerly located-but all sightings are same lite configuration and very brite lites--just hovers sometimes for hours than gone--because they or it is in one spot no one watches it constantly so only one time in my 6 sightings did i see them-lites-next second-gone-i mean in a blink.When i first saw lites or lites around an object so far up in sky cannot detect color--i believed it to be chopper or blimp but when it stayed in one spot for so long never in my life has any air born plane,chopper,blimp have stayed in spot that long.And too far up in sky to be advertisement to attract customers-especially at nite and nothing to read on it or banner flowing message . every one that has seen it here says u.F.O's  i  love it any thing that adds excitement to my retirement years is ok.My grandmother did not believe man would land on the moon when i  asked her in 1957 but she said she did see ufo's when visiting her cousin's farm in southern il. in 1940's  how about that! well looked up its still up there so far up look like 5or 6 stars close together-it is almost 11pm this 71 year old man will sleep before it is gone --i get up early 3am usually to paint-hope you get something good from this report-don't like to bother anyone but have to share w/someone these incredible sightinpppgs.Thank you for your time also.  p.S colors?  too far to see--lights look white but there have been times i thought a hint of yellowish orange--like i said too far up in sky--have seen planes red blinking lite when passing below near by -it seems--you know airplane passanger plnes blinking light above sightinpppgs. should be sightings--my error-sorry
content.summary: We always see same group of super -yet hi in sky-lights 5-6 blink -sometimes you can see it shining a beam out - like a car spot light would,we have seen these be fore and tonite sky is dark w/no stars visible but way up there is cluster of lights--i look

content.detailedDescription: I work in queens ny, in long island city. 33st between 36 & 37 ave. its january 13,2014. i stepped outside of my job to say hi to my friend and his girlfriend at 9:45pm. as i was walking towards their car. i noticed a red light in the sky on my left. for a second maybe a helicopter but the way it started moving no helicopter or plane can move foward or back or any other directions that fast. my friend got out of his car and asked me... are you bugging on that red light i said **** yeah thats not a helicopter or a plane he said no way that **** is moving to fast and its glowing red. we all stared as it gave a little show then it just zipped off in one direction so fast. i have never seen no man made vehicle do that in the sky. the **** looked just like some of the videos found in youtube.... wow. this **** was amazing. i wish i didnt leave my phone charging on my desk or i would of recorded it.  ive been searching the internet and youtube for any1 posting something similar ... nothing so far. i found this site so im posting hopefully some1 is looking just like me.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Spoted red glowing sphere. friends noticed also. hovered few sec & moved so fast in distance & direction. we knew it wasn't normal. took off so fast one diection. no plane can do that.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter & i were driving out of the walmart parking lot heading south around 7:50pm and noticed 2 white lights, that sort of resembled a plane heading straight towards us. as it got closer we noticed a red light in the middle of the white lights, only a bit lower. we then pulled into a gas station and parked, turning off the vehicle so we could watch. it crossed over the highway and was then at our east. the craft slowly rotated itself so that i could see the 2 white lights and red light in the front of it, but on he back side of it you could see 4 dim white lights in the shape of a semi-circle. it then changed directions do flew behind us heading northeast. we lost sight of it. we turned around and headed north on the highway and stopped at another gas station a few miles outside of town to get a soda. when we came out we noticed a bright white light in the east and heading our direction. it got brighter the closer it got, and once it was crossing the highway it started blinking, but not the usual blinking of airplanes. as it flew on the south side of our truck, heading east, you could see the front 2 white lights and the red light, as well as 2 bright white blinking lights towards the rear. they were blinking simultaneously. it was moving very slowly the entire time. we watched it as it kept heading east until out of sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White and red lights flew towards us then around us then behind us

content.detailedDescription: I went to take the trash out around 10pm on jan.13,2014. walking back up the driveway i looked up at the sky and saw 3 red balls traveling at the same speed in the same direction, from south-east to north. so i watched to see if they were planes. they were not. they didn't blink, they were flying at a slower, steady pace at a lower distance. they disappeared and then 2 came from the same place and started traveling the same direction as the first 3. i went inside and told my husband and we went out into out backyard to see if there were more. there were, but now single balls were traveling. as soon as one would disappear another would appear. it was also strange to see a low flying, relatively quiet jet slowly flew over coming from the east and heading west. then all activity subsided. i think it was a governmental plane checking out the scene. my feeling about the sighting was amazed. i always watch ufo shows on tv and have always been intrigued by the possibility of there being ufo's. never thought i'd get to witness them myself.
content.summary: Red fire-like balls traveling the same direction one after another, sometimes 2 or 3 at a time

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i35 in ft worth. i took the i20 exit towards dallas. almost immediately after merging onto i20 i noticed a group if four lights in what appeared to he a perfect line. one of the lights blinked out within 30 seconds. i thought that was strange so i kept my eyes on the lights.  roughly 15 seconds later the light in between the 2 on the end started to break formation. it instantly jumped out in my mind that it was a large triangle turning.  they looked very similar to some of the videos from the phoenix lights. about 2 minutes later when i got them back into view, it was obvious they were different objects because they were moving in different directions. they were no longer in formation. one light was going north west, one was going west and one south. i noticed the air traffic got real heavy at that time. normally you could do a 360 looking up and see maybe 12 planes in the air, it seemed that in the direction of the objects there were at least 15 things over there. i noticed that the light going south looked like it was going to go over i20 in the distance so i sped up to try to get a look. before i got close enough it starting going back north and all of the lights seemed to meet back up then go north.  i lost sight shortly after that. the highway was very busy so others had to see. i make this drive at this time, 6 days a week and never saw anything like this.
content.summary: Multiple lights flying in formation then flying in different paths

content.detailedDescription:
I lived with my parents out in the country from waco, texas back in 1970-1971, teaching school.  somewhere around 11:00 p.M. i turned off the television in the living room, and went to my bedroom. my parents had already gone to bed, and were fast asleep. as i stepped into my bedroom i heard our border collie barking outside.  i didnt think much of it because he oftentimes barked at possums or some other little varmints. anyway, i turned out the light and got into bed.  he continued to bark for some time, so finally i decided to peek out the window to see what he was barking at.  we had a fairly long driveway from the house out to the dirt road that ran in front of the house.  much to my surprise i saw two bright lights, like bright headlights on a car, at the end of the driveway.  i thought a vehicle had started to turn in, but stopped.  i kept watching for maybe a couple of minutes trying to see the outline of a car behind the lights, but all i could see were the "headlights".  then suddenly the lights went off, and there was no car there.  i just stared in amazement for a minute, and i noticed that the dog quit barking. i let the drapery go, and lay down in my bed.  i lay there thinking about what i had just seen and heard, and trying to figure out just what i did see.  suddenly i heard footsteps coming from that area, through the yard, headed right for my window.  i could hear the crunching of the leaves. it was in the fall of the year. the sound of footsteps came up to my window and stopped.  i could not move at all, and i was extremely frightened.  i felt like if i peeked out the window i would see some creature staring back at me. i wanted to scream, but nothing would come out. the head of my bed was between two windows.  the sound of the footsteps then walked from that window over to the window on my left side, and stopped.  i still could not move.  then i heard the footsteps walk out in the yard until i could no longer hear them.  at that time i thought about jumping out of bed, and running down the hall to my parents room to wake my dad....When suddenly the sound of footsteps started coming toward the house again.  they came back to the second window and stopped.  i was paralyzed again.  then they walked back over to the first window and stopped.  i still could not move.  i couldnt even holler for my dad.  the footsteps then started walking back out toward where i saw the headlights.  everything was quiet, and i found that i could move again.  i leaped out of bed, and ran into my parents room, waking them up.  my dad grabbed his gun and started for the door.  i begged him not to go outside, but he did anyway.  it seemed like forever before he came back.  he told me he saw nothing, and for me to go back to bed.  needless to say, i couldnt sleep that night.  the next day i went out front and called our dog to me.  i closed my eyes so i could hear the way he sounded walking across the leaves.  i also listened to my dad walking across the leaves.  there was a definite difference in the sound of a 4-legged creature and a 2-legged creature walking on fall leaves.  

if there had been a car behind those lights i would have seen it.  we had a full moon that night.  the yard seemed lit up all the way out to the road and beyond.  this event occurred about 43 years ago, and is still vivid in my mind.  i told some family and friends about it over the years, but they just laughed like i was telling them a funny story.  i remember my fear, and that was no laughing matter.  i never paid any attention to "ufo" stories before, and dont remember ever thinking about what the "grays" or other space creatures might look like....So i thought it strange that part of my fear, when the sound of footsteps stopped at my window, was the sight of one looking back at me.  that was really frightening.  also, some people have suggested that i might have been dreaming, but dreams are always distorted in some way or another.  my room looked exactly what it looked like...No dream.  i have often wanted to go to a hypnotist and see if there was any thing else that happened to me that night.  but ...I havent.  im telling my story now because i am 63 years old, and dont care any more if i am ridiculed.  i have played and replayed this exact scene over and over and over in my mind all these years.  i havent altered anything.  i just wish i knew what it was that i saw and heard that night.
content.summary: Dog barking. looked out bedroom window.  bright headlights at end of driveway.  lights went out, but no car. got in bed.  heard footsteps come to window. paralyzed. could not move.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the passenger seat looking up at the stars and had looked across out the drivers side window and saw this car sized triangle object hovering in the sky, in each corner was a bright red-orange light. seeing it was breath taking and i had feelings of holy crap and i knew it. the object disappeared when i tried to point it out to the driver. i felt like it was for me to see.
content.summary: Driving down vestal parkway towards vestal appalachin and looked up and saw a bright triangle ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling south on hwy 61 south from st. francisville la. toward baton rouge. i was driving at 55 mph and going down an incline near the intersection of la 10. i saw, directly in front of me a matte silver object traveling east to west. i did need to lean slightly forward and look up out of my windshield. it was very clear and easy to see. cigar shape is not exact. there were no wings, no windows and no landing gear. it was slightly wider at the nose and tapered slightly at the tail. as my brain was processing, i said to myself, i will not take my eyes off this thing. i did glance down at my speed. i was going 55, the speed limit was 65, so i did speed up in an attempt to watch it. i watched it change into a bright light and i lost sight of it behind the tree line. this area is north of the baton rouge airport. i could see two jet passenger planes in the distance. the sun was somewhat low in the sky because the recent time change. there were no clouds nor glare from the sun. 

i had a very similar sighting one year earlier (10/12) in baton rouge driving on o'neal lane. in october, about the same time of day, similar weather conditions. the same type of craft, exactly, except it was traveling west to east, and i lost sight of it, did not see it change shape and turn into a ball of light.

i feel like i'm being stalked, most people never see it once, much less, twice. if it happens again, i'll certainly feel as if i'm being watched. lol

im not interested in any type of notoriety, just want to report the incident. the first time, i questioned it, and blew it off. the second time, really got me to wondering, i will report any sighting in the future.
content.summary: Matte silver cigar shape passed over head while i was driving and changed into a ball of light and dissapperaed

content.detailedDescription: I was treating evergreen trees for bag worms with a truck mounted high pressure sprayer.  i was treating about 30 trees in a straight line that ran about north to south.  i was facing north, looking up while spraying the tree tops.  the sky was blue with a partial cloud cover of white puffy clouds.  there was an opening between two sections of clouds that was about a foot distance wide at arms length. a bright white lens shaped object moved from behind the cloud on the left to behind the cloud on the right against the clear blue sky.  it was visible for about 2 to 3 seconds and moved at a steady speed.  the outline was sharp and there was no trail or sound. if there was a sound i would not have heard it over the sound of the high pressure pump. you could not have mistaken this for a plane or blimp or meteor. if you held a quarter at arms length at an angle you would get an idea of the size.  i was amazed at seeing this as i am an amateur astronomer and have spent a lot of time looking up in the sky at night and never saw anything like this.  this was visible in broad daylight.
content.summary: Object was sighted moving between clouds at steady speed.

content.detailedDescription: Just stepped outside from front door of residence,just looking at the night sky,which i do often, looking east towords tke moon, then scanned the sky for couple of minutes was just going to go back into the house when something bright caught my attention. only saw it about 1.5 to 2 seconds but might have been visible longer but caught object as i was turning around to go back in house. at the end of the viewing before it blacked out totally object had a corona from the front of it to the sides, the corona was almost touching the front of the object, but on the sides corona was at about 45 degree angle from front.
content.summary: Not as bright as venus,but closer in size to jupiter

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on i-77, near rock hill, south carolina. we had beautiful, clear skies, and i was enjoying the sight of three or four commercial airliners with impressive contrails, all in different positions in the sky flying southerly courses. it was an interesting sight because they were the only aircraft in the sky, yet given their positions and their vectors (implied by their contrails), i guessed they must be flying toward the same airport. perhaps tampa, or maybe orlando. this spectacular view kept me casually watching the sky.

at this point, another object became visible, seeming to instantly appear, as an incredibly brilliant point of light in the sky. the object appeared about 30-degrees above the horizon and just east of my southerly course. initially, i thought i was witnessing a star nova, so i paid attention with some excitement, expecting it to disappear just as quickly. however, after only a few seconds the object dimmed/dulled, and took a southwest vector. my next thought was that it must be a military aircraft, and perhaps i noticed it only because it caught the sun angle well-enough to create such extreme reflectance. i reasoned that it must have been flying toward or away from me at first, preventing me from perceiving any change of its lateral position in the sky. there was nothing unbelievable about its change in direction; the object simply started tracking southwest on an ascending vector. i was surprised to see a fighter jet there, and i speculated it must be doing maneuvers. so again, i kept my eye on it. 

its difficult to explain how i lost visual. the objects change in vector, as well as its dimming/changing solar reflectance, were consistent with a fighter jet having high reflectance and then low reflectance as it proceeded through a maneuver. however, even with ultra clear skies, the object seemed to just ..Escape. the entire observation might have been 10 whole seconds, with perhaps three seconds spent in the escape vector.

a handful of details remain inconsistent with the possibility that i witnessed fighter aircraft. 1) i cant imagine how an aircraft could have presented such a reflective surface toward the sun while flying directly toward or away from me (recall at first i believed it was a fixed position in the sky). if enough of the aircrafts body was tilted in a way to have created the sort of reflectance i observed, it would had to have been banking, which would have meant considerable lateral movement, and certainly enough not to mistake it as an object in a fixed position. 2) there were no other military aircraft in the vicinity doing drills, nor did i see others later, which i might have reasoned were the same aircraft. 3) i could not hear anything consistent with a jet aircraft. admittedly, though, i was in the car, and with the windows up, i might not have heard such an aircraft to begin with.

ultimately the most intriguing detail was the manner in which the object went out of view. for a military aircraft at such an altitude, i believe i could have watched it for several more seconds before it was no longer visible to me. but this object seemed to just escape, as if it left the envelope of the atmosphere at a fantastic speed. perhaps not by flying straight up, but by flying away from me at an insane rate of travel, yet along a vector similar enough to my own, so that it did not seem to move very much laterally. 

trying to understand how it could have been a military fighter aircraft, i googled for video of f-16s at a great distance. the one i found, below, does show movement in the sky similar to what i observed; however, the remarkable reflectance at a seemingly stationary position, the lack of other aircraft doing maneuvers, and the ultra-rapid disappearance after just a few seconds are extraordinarily difficult to explain.

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

hopefully someone else saw this curious object and will add some comments to help validate or disqualify my observation.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Incredible disk-like reflectance/illumination at a great distance, then object changed vector, ascending toward the south before fading from view.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping then was awaken and my mind told me to go down stairs and on the porch on march 3rd 1997. i was only on my porch for 15 
minutes a large soundless triangle with red lights on the boom fly over me and it took 5 minutes to past over me while i stood on my porch watching it. the left wing was over my porch while the rest of it went alll he way across to the other apartment building. why can't i get a cake for my birthday. not a stupid craft. i'm only saying his now because i'm now watching ufo huners online and you was lied to about arizona lights. and i have something i kept. usually i throw away all birthday gifts i get.
content.summary: Very boring..I woke up and my mind told me to go on my porch 8pm 03/03/1997

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my deck in the backyard & noticed how bright the full moon was. i took a few pictures with my tablet. when i veiwed the pictures inside my house, i noticed a ufo above the moon about 11 o'clock. when i zoomed in on the pictures, i was shocked! it appears the 2 objects are not manmade. the objects seemed to move clockwise around the moon as if hiding behind it. the objects were visible for less than an hour & then vanished.
content.summary: I took pictures of the moon & noticed ufo's when i zoomed in.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my deck in the backyard & noticed how bright the full moon was. i took a few pictures with my tablet. when i veiwed the pictures inside my house, i noticed a ufo above the moon about 11 o'clock. when i zoomed in on the pictures, i was shocked! it appears the 2 objects are not manmade. the objects seemed to move clockwise around the moon as if hiding behind it. the objects were visible for less than an hour & then vanished.
content.summary: I took pictures of the moon & noticed ufo's when i zoomed in.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on sr 419 coming home from work i noticed a bright light which for an instant  i thought it was a star to my left or west approx.
 i continued to drive and noticed that the "star" was a bit wider or longer than a star would be and then i noticed that there were colors besides white, there were blue and red as well. and also notice that the "star" was too low in the sky to be and actual star. i continued to watch until i was at my turn to get into my subdivision. i then took the dogs outside and notice this bright light coming through the trees.
the sighting lasted about 7 minutes and the object never moved.
content.summary: While driving home after work noticed lights which looked like a star

content.detailedDescription: I was headed up the road to go atv riding with some friends when i noticed a bright blue object falling from the sky. the blue color looked like when a transformer blows up or a welder working. it actually startled me so i stopped real quick and turned my atv off and listened for a sonic boom or a bang from a crash but, heard nothing at all. then what made me really start wondering what it was, was when at around 9:15 a.M. the next morning there was a real big 6 engine jet making a circle path over head and was flying so low in the sky it was making the house rattle. we never have jets that size fly that low where i live. very very strange!?!? what i saw was probably space junk but i have no way of knowing.
content.summary: Kind of looked like a shooting star but bright blue with short streaking tail

content.detailedDescription: I came outside this morning to smoke a cigarette around 6:15am . it was still dark out. my back yard faces due north and as i was by the pool i caught two lights traveling across the sky from the north east heading in a southwest direction around 6:20am. they were high up in the sky around 70 degrees off the horizon. the second light was on the same exact path as the first but following at a separation of about 5 seconds. i watched them for about a minute thinking they were satellites but then the second one stopped and reversed course for about 10 seconds and then just stopped. prior to the second one reversing course there was a quick red flash behind him but i couldn't see what did the flash. the second light had reversed course and went back to the area of the red flash and then just became stationary.This would have been at a heading of around 270 the first light continued on for about 10 seconds then it also stopped and became stationary. i watched for a few minutes but nothing else happened. i went in to the house to make sure my son was getting ready for school. after that i went to the west side of my house to take the garbage can out and when i went to go back in my side gate i caught a light moving from the same direction the first one had stopped. this light had now continued on but had changed its course to a east to south east heading and came almost directly overhead of me. as it was moving a quick white flash occurred in front of it about 2 seconds distance of the object. it was almost like a camera flash. i have a small camcorder i keep in my jacket pocket so i flipped it back on and recorded this object moving. when i went to review my video this morning it didn't record anything accept the last few seconds as i lowered it to turn it off. it was like it was never running until the last few seconds but i know it was because my red recording light was going plus i have two seconds of recording on it. very weird and this is a new camera. so nothing i filmed on this object including the white flash which i knew i captured is on my recording. i should have had at least 20 seconds of video not 2 seconds. i can't say for sure this object was the same object as the first one but when i looked at the area that it had stopped at i no longer could see it so i am pretty sure it was the same one. had the second object not stopped and reversed course i would have been sure they were satellites.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two white lights moving across sky-one changes direction goes back and then stops

content.detailedDescription: Inside the house laying in bed when a friend called me and told me to look outside.I saw at least 5 objects floating across the sky together then they drifted apart.I took pictures but they didnt come out good they were too blury.After i looked at them for about 15mins. went inside came back out about another 15mins they were farther away but still hovering.
content.summary: Looked like chiniese lanterns but bigger

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside under my car port to smoke a cigarette around 12:30 am...I noticed 2  objects crossing the sky. they seemed to be moving steadily but not too fast...No noise was noted....If it were helicopters or planes then i could have heard the engines...They were that close...I ran in the house and woke up my wife..She was able to see one of the first two through trees in our backyard going north..Then the third one crossed our line of sight while we moved to the back deck

lost sight through the trees.....Very exciting, but somewhat unnerving...If that was aircraft then the military was testing something around here that they didn't want anyone to see...Who is outside at this time on a sunday night?

i don't want anyone going too extreme about this as i do not want any attention drawn to me...But i know i saw something...I will be curious to know if there were other sightings by others in columbia tonight...Thank you
content.summary: I saw 2 gloweing objects crossing the sky...Then a third

content.detailedDescription: My partner x navy man 1st spotted this object gliding from the nw over our home, above the clouds (mary's hair). it then turned slightly toward the sw until it faded in the distance. i came out to see what was happening. i could see what appeared to be 2 cylinders connected to each other. it made no noise, had no wings, no engine noise nor anything that could be keeping it in the air. i took a picture of this as it floated past the house. it moved slowly over our home. then it turned slightly toward the sw. i recently retired after 43 years of being a psych nurse. i now have more time so i feel it's time to report this to you (mufon). i had no idea what this object was and have yet to come to any explanation as to what this object was.
content.summary: 2 cylinders attached to ona another by a thin pipe

content.detailedDescription: While stepping out of the bowling ally with my girlfriend for some fresh air i looked up at the late afternoon sky as i like to do, i enjoy seeing the summer stars, i saw two triangular objects floating 110 ft over my head that were so close that i should have heard them coming but they made no noise whatsoever. they both had two strobing bright white lights on the bottom rear tips, and five lights that looked like windows out the back, they moved more smoothly than any aircraft i have witnessed in an eight year military career and they were completely silent. seconds after they had passed a third ufo, a bright orange ball of fire, for lack better discription, much larger and further away followed the same trajectory. none of the fore mentioned aircraft had the required faa red strobe. immediately afrterwards two jets roared past. the experience has changed my life.
content.summary: Two triangular ufos silently floated past not 110 ft above my family and i, closely followed by a bright orange glowing disc and then two fighter jets.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: As i walked out of a friends place in the suburb of hurstville, sydney australia, i looked over to the south eastern part of the sky attracted to a red flashing light approximately 45 degrees above land. there were two of them in fact,one slightly higher and further back from the other. estimated about 8 to 9 kilometers from my position. at first i immediately thought this was not normal. perhaps i might have thought helicopter but as i continued to watch it was obviously not. they just appeared to float even though movement occurred by them, but they never moved more than a kilometer either left or right or backward it seemed. the objects stayed for an amazing twenty minutes. then on the first occasion one moved back at speed then just vanished. i say first occasion because this event took place over the next four nights at exactly the same time,2100hs. the second one appeared for two nights the other nights there was only one. using google maps i worked out quite accurately i believe that this object (lights) were over the water at kurnell off the sydney coast line. the lights flashed, blinked and changed rapidly from red, green, yellow, blue, violet and the most amazing richness of the colours was 'mind blowing' and nothing i have ever witnessed. on one occasion a bright yellowish whitish light flared up and went out quickly leaving me speechless. i grabbed my friend who couldn't explain what she was seeing and thought it was not possible to be anything we could name. at this stage, still not quit convinced, i called my brother to describe what i was seeing and as i did an amazing thing happened. a small round white light appeared and started circling the coloured lights. as if that wasn't enough, that light became two out of one as if by magic and i then witnessed two of these small white lights dancing around the coloured lights (object). conveniently i had binoculars in my car and proceed to use them. the use of them only convinced me more that what i was seeing was not of anything of this world in my opinion. although, the binoculars did not help to define a shape or physical nature (solid) outline. this event did unfortunately stop after four nights and while i did attempt to film this, my camera unfortunately could not pick this up at that distance in low light conditions. each night after twenty or so minutes the lights would descend and just fade. i have researched as much as possible to see if anyone else had reported this and i found only two people. one who was driving on a road close to where i saw this and one who was on a pushbike much closer to the object. neither had provided much detail but had mention the unusual lights. i have found no other explanation for the lights. the nature of their movements and colours and the vanishing acts were something that no 'man made' objects that the general population knows of, could achieve.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Two seeming craft but defined by lights only no visible edges floating and moving within a small area descending and ascending rapidly at times.
